column5: Just found out a new Sponsor to the Board Fishing World in Hamilton is having an after hours sale this Tuesday Dec 19. Couldn't find out everything on sale but was told there would be some great stuff available for Xmas gifts or gear that you just want to buy.  I did ask TJ if it was okay to post and I thought since they are new sponsors to the board it would be a great opportunity to show Fishing World some support.

I just saw the add for the sale tomorrow night.  Hours are 6 - 10pm and some of the deals are a Shimano TX4000FB for $18.88 reg $49.99, Riverside Ice Fishing Combo reg $40 on sale for $15.88, Berkley Muskie Rod reg $90 on sale for $28.88, Irish Setter No track boots reg $180 on sale for $99, Shimano Sedona/Bob Izumi Rod Combo special price $99, selected Rebel and Smithwick lures $2.99.  These are some great deals!!! Hope to see a few of you there as I am hoping to get up there myself and do some final Xmas shopping.
Saw the Fishing World ad pop-up today.  Great to see them aboard. It's a great store and Mike and Jim are always helpful and very open with their massive fishing knowledge.

wish I was closer would stop in forsure it sucks not having any stores right close to me but then again I guess I can hit the big guys in MI and OH but would still like to hit local sales have fun everyone
Thanks for the info.  Sales on fishing gear are always popular around the OFC.
Yeah I know alot of members that do shop there and thought that some of you would want to take in some of these great deals and other in store specials
Thanks for the heads up, but for me Hamilton is too far to go, and frankly after Christmas Shopping, I have no money left to spend on me  Maureen
Sounds like a sale to off load all the crap they couldn't sell all year.  None of that stuff piques my interest, unfortunately.  Tony
